title: As a DTC Admin, I want to View an Employee's Drug Test Consent History from the DTC Table
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be0388c407064d7154128|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be0388c407064d7154128|smart-link] [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/6732495e9177a1fe0c47fe2f|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/6732495e9177a1fe0c47fe2f|smart-link] 

Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/4252860554/Drug+Test+Consent|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/4252860554/Drug+Test+Consent|smart-link] 

AC:

* To the left of each row on the DTC table, there will be a clock icon
* Selecting the clock icon will bring up an â€œEmployee Historyâ€� panel displayed on the right side of the screen
* On this panel, there will be a table with the following columns:
** Year
** Org
*** Only display employee DTC history for the Org that the DTC table is filtered for
** Changes Since Prev. Roster Cert.
*** Will be initially blank
*** To display additional info as shown in the wireframe and specified in the linked data discovery
** DT Consent Status
*** If the status is â€œSigned,â€� then there should be a downloadable attachment of the signed DTC form next to the status
** Date Sent
** Date Signed
* This table will update with every relevant DTC change 
** A new row will be created for every new form sent
* Note: An identical Drug Testing Consent History table should display on an employeeâ€™s profile and update in tandem with the table on the DTC page 
** Display the employeeâ€™s full dtc history across all orgs, if applicable

title: As a DTC Admin, I want to be able to Add & View Comments from the DTC Table
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679ce03c31ada3a1b720468d|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679ce03c31ada3a1b720468d|smart-link] [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679ce03e5109e7dca1843e52|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679ce03e5109e7dca1843e52|smart-link] 

AC:

* To the left of each row, there will be a comment bubble button
** The comment bubble icon will initially be open or unfilled
* Selecting the comment bubble will bring up a â€œNotesâ€� panel on the right side of the screen where the user will be able to add a new comment 
* The panel will have â€œSaveâ€� and â€œCloseâ€� buttons on it
** The â€œSaveâ€� button will not be clickable unless there is new text in the modal
** Selecting to Close will will remove the panel from the screen and will undo any changes made without saving
** Selecting to Save a comment will add the comment to the relevant employee row
*** The comment bubble icon will then get filled in to indicate that there is a comment

title: As an EDC Admin, I want to be able to Export the DTC Table as an Excel File
custom_steps:
AC:

* Above the Drug Test Consent table on the right, there will be a download button
* Selecting this button will create two separate Excel files.
** MM-DD-YYYY-ORG-EDCDrugTestConsent-FullExport
** MM-DD-YYYY-ORG-EDCDrugTestConsent-CollectorExport
* The first file (MM-DD-YYYY-ORG-EDCDrugTestConsent-FullExport) would contain the following fields:
** EDC ID Number
** Employee
** DOB
** Gender
** Title
** Role
** Org
** Affiliate
** Location
** Email
** Phone
** Date Signed
** Sent to Collectors
** DT Status
** DT Consent Status
** Date Sent
** Changes Since Prev. Roster Cert.
** Prev. Date Signed
* The second file (MM-DD-YYYY-ORG-EDCDrugTestConsent-CollectorExport) would contain the following fields:
** EDC ID Number
** Employee
** DOB
** Gender
** Title
** Role
** Org
** Affiliate
** Location
** Email
** Phone
** Date Signed
* If the DTC table is filtered in any way, the Excel export will represent the filtered information

title: Signed DT Consent Form Workflow
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02236a5fedb2ac980bf|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02236a5fedb2ac980bf|smart-link] , [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/6732495e9177a1fe0c47fe2f|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/6732495e9177a1fe0c47fe2f|smart-link] 

AC:

* When an employee completes the Adobe Esign of the Drug Test Consent Form, the following updates will occur on both the DTC page and in the relevant employeeâ€™s profile in the â€œDrug Testing Consent Historyâ€� table:
** The signed consent form will appear as a downloadable PDF attachment
** â€œDT Consent Statusâ€� will update to â€œSignedâ€�
** â€œDate Signedâ€� will update to display the date the form was successfully signed & sent back to the portal

title: As a DTC Admin, I want to be able to make Bulk Actions on the DTC Table
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02702bd6f797edf6f32|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02702bd6f797edf6f32|smart-link] [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be01c8fe3ee415711683f|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be01c8fe3ee415711683f|smart-link] [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02236a5fedb2ac980bf|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02236a5fedb2ac980bf|smart-link] 

AC:

* Above the Drug Test Consent table, there will be three buttons:
** Send DT Consent Form
** Sent to Collectors
** Switch DT Status
* These buttons will be grayed out and unclickble by default 
* There will be checkboxes to the far left on every employee row on the DTC table
* There will also be a Select All checkbox at the top of the table
* Selecting one (or more) checkbox will prompt these buttons to become clickable
* Button Actions:
** Send DT Consent Form:
*** Will send DT Consent Form to the selected employee(s) via Adobe Esign integration
*** Will update the relevant employee(s) DT Consent Status column to the â€œSentâ€� status
*** Will update the Date Sent column to the current date
** Sent to Collectors
*** Will update the selected employee(s) â€œSent to Collectorsâ€� column to â€œYesâ€�
** Switch DT Status
*** Will update the selected employee(s)' DT Status to the inverse of what is currently selected for them (Eligible â†’ Ineligible, Ineligible â†’ Eligible)

title: As a Drug Test Consent Admin, I want to Send Consent Forms from the EDC Portal
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02702bd6f797edf6f32|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02702bd6f797edf6f32|smart-link] [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be01c8fe3ee415711683f|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be01c8fe3ee415711683f|smart-link] [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02236a5fedb2ac980bf|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/679be02236a5fedb2ac980bf|smart-link] 

Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/4252860554/Drug+Test+Consent|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/4252860554/Drug+Test+Consent|smart-link] 

AC:

* Above the Drug Test Consent table will be a â€œSend DT Consent Formâ€� button
** This button will be unclickable and grayed out by default
* On the Drug Test Consent table, there will be checkboxes to the left of each employee name and a select all checkbox at the top of the table
* Selecting a checkbox will cause the the Send Form button to become clickable
* Selecting to â€œSend DT Consent Formâ€� will trigger the system to create a Drug Test Consent form via an Adobe Esign integration and send the form to the selected employee(s)
** Selecting to send the form will result in the system looking to the respective employeeâ€™s â€œPreferred Languageâ€� on their profile and send the form in the selected language (English or Spanish)
* Once the form is successfully sent, a green success notification will flash at the top of the screen
* Once the form is sent, the DT Consent Status columns for the relevant employees will update from â€œNot Sentâ€� (the default status) to â€œSentâ€�
* The Date Sent column will also update to reflect the date the form was sent to the relevant employee

* The EDC Portal layout will match the attached wireframe. The left nav pages will be:
** Roster

* There will be the following filters at the top of the screen:

*** Dropdown

*** Dropdown
